Headliner HL0800 Alpine A110 1800 1973 Rallye Monte Carlo Winner J. C. Andruet/Biche



First WRC win for Jean-Claude Andruet
First WRC win for Alpine
First WRC win for A110 1800

1973 was the first year of the WRC and Alpine kicked it all off with a 1-2-3 finish at the historic Rallye Monte Carlo. Itâ€™s fair to say Alpine dominated the season with 6 wins and 15 podiums. No one else came close. Alpine finished the season they way they started it, with a 1-2-3 finish at the Tour de Corse. And that was pretty much it for Alpine. They only managed 2 podiums in 1974 with more in subsequent seasons but they never won another WRC event.

If you have a few minutes, this article about the 1973 Monte Carlo is worth the read: Andruet & Alpine: forever the winners.
